text: 7.15-16: FG 10.14-15Bigɨn the kɨrar kegap, guma ndav vhen vergap, anan ndava vhee muuŋgim, ana nzaŋnzaŋgirga tuktɨgi fhu. Mba guma ndav vhen kegap kɨrar hi bigi, ana ndava vhee muuŋgim, ana nzaŋnzaŋgi.” 7.15-16 Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ garav nta kaŋgi gumgi mbari, mbe kha ndɨkndɨga mbui, harigi kama mueŋ phorga khar ki. Mba kameŋ khaŋ muuŋgi suambara mbui, “Guma khuarani kɨv ana mbararari.”
